Configuration.Name: Primo VE
Configuration.Author: IDS Project
Configuration.Description: Performs an Title, ISBN, and ISSN Search in the Primo VE interface. Updated for Chromium.

Setting.name: AutoSearchISxN
Setting.Description: Defines whether the ISxN search should be automatically performed when the form opens.

Setting.name: AutoSearchOCLC
Setting.Description: Defines whether the OCLC# search should be automatically performed when the form opens.

Setting.name: AutoSearchTitle
Setting.Description: Defines whether the Title search should be automatically performed when the form opens.

Setting.name: WhichTitle
Setting.Description: Check box to search Article Title instead of Journal Title

Setting.name: PrimoVEURL
Setting.Description: Defines the default landing page for your Primo VE page See the ReadMe for an example.

Setting.name: BaseVEURL
Setting.Description: Defines the base of your Primo VE URL. See the ReadMe for an example.

Setting.name: SearchScope
Setting.Description: Defines the search scope of your Primo VE URL. Default is MyInstitution

Setting.name: DatabaseName
Setting.Description: Defines the Database Name of your Primo VE URL. See the ReadMe for an example.

Setting.name: BarcodeLocation
Setting.Description: Defines the location for the Barcode. Example: ReferenceNumber.
